content: this is a summary of a legal agreement reached through mediation between two parties in a succession case in sesto san giovanni the agreement states that one of the deceaseds children wants to sell their share of the inherited property to their sibling the sale will be for a total amount of 41000 euros with 35000 euros to be paid upon transfer of ownership and the remaining 6000 euros to be paid in monthly installments the buyer will be responsible for the notarial expenses both parties agree to enter into the agreement by july 10 2019 the lawyers of the parties sign the agreement and waive any joint liability additionally the parties agree to keep the details of the agreement confidential
